docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: About two weeks ago, something happened that may subtly undermine the recent efforts of antismoking advocates: the tobacco industry raised cigarette prices and most smokers went along.

headline.main: Price-Blind Smoker Loyalty Defies Economics and Critics

docs.snippet: LEAD: About two weeks ago, something happened that may subtly undermine the recent efforts of antismoking advocates: the tobacco industry raised cigarette prices and most smokers went along.
